channel.title: Webcam picture capturing
channel.description: i need to take some pictures and my 360 webcam has just as good picture quality as my digital camera, or as it seems to be. anyways my camera fucking eats batteries, is there program that captures still pictures using webcams?

item.title: Webcam picture capturing
item.dc:creator: @Ii_1337_iI Ii 1337 iI
item.description:
@Ii_1337_iI wrote:

oooooooohh woopie, as if i couln’t figure that out within 30 seconds.[quote=“TheBeanie, post:2, topic:174038”]Just the program that comes with your cam so you can see yourself… pose or what ever you want to do and press print screen (above the Insert button)

And then go into paint. press pain… and then use the scissor tools to cut around your picture, then right click on that and click copy. start a new paint. and make the white box small… then click paste.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Webcam picture capturing
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Just the program that comes with your cam so you can see yourself… pose or what ever you want to do and press print screen (above the Insert button)

And then go into paint. press pain… and then use the scissor tools to cut around your picture, then right click on that and click copy. start a new paint. and make the white box small… then click paste.

Read full topic
